name: The Story Of Jonah
description: The Story Of Jonah is a series of satirical documentaries created as a means to explore scripture through understanding history and perspective. The Story Of Jonah is a four chapter set of short films from the book of Jonah in the Old Testament, told from the viewpoint of several different characters that were (and may have been) involved in the story during that time. Directed/Filmed/Edited by Samuel Louis Gensic. Starring Adam Knott and Dirk Rowley. Co-starring Brian Coffey, Laura Cook, Ajit Joseph, Seth Lochmueller, Scott Miller, Hunter Paris, Jeff Ostermann, Logan Roberson, and Steve VonGunten. *Includes a fully-authored DVD with DVD case insert / DVD label artwork, motion menus with audio, all four featured short films, and an extras submenu with a trailer, over one hour of outtakes, and the option to watch the films with the director's commentary (accompanied by a different actor for each chapter). *To view the first chapter of the story, click HERE.

name: $25 Donation
description:
Donations are acceptable in increments of $25 to support the visual content creation of Samuel Louis Gensic.

Unfortunately, at this time these donations are not tax-deductible.
